alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 4:49PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Newberry, northwestern Lexington, southeastern Saluda, northeastern Aiken and northwestern Richland Counties through 530 PM EST... At 448 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Batesburg-Leesville, moving northeast at 45 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Irmo, Batesburg-Leesville, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, St. Andrews, Harbison State Forest, Ballentine, Dreher Island State Park, Chapin, Gilbert, Summit, Monetta, Peak, Cedar Grove Fire Station, South Shore Marina, Oswald Park, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock, and Murray. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 34 and 51. Interstate 26 between mile markers 87 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
